commands.condition: If within 7 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Only if adjacent, move at least 4 spaces away, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If a red die rolls a single damage
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the red die.

commands.condition: If possible to be adjacent to 2 hostile figures
commands.command: {ACTION} If necessary, move adjacent to those figures, then {ACTION} Use Brutality ability to attack those targets.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} but have LOS
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Force Choke ability on {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} and no LOS to any hostile figures
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - While defending
commands.command: If {EVADE} does nothing, reroll it. Otherwise, reroll a die with 1 {BLOCK}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} but already attacked once
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the closest hostile figure for the second attack.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces and have LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET} but already attacked once
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the closest hostile figure for the second attack.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If 2 other friendly figures are not within attack range or LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use General's Orders ability to move those figures within attack range and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to be in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - Epic Arsenal
commands.command: If within 2 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}, use two red and one green dice. Otherwise, use one red, one blue, and one green dice.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to be in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: If not within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is within attack range and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of a friendly target that is not adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Executive Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces and in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to be in LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: If not within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to the most friendly figures.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Pounce ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to closest target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no target within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending
commands.command: Use Cunning ability

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Pounce ability to attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to closest target, then {ACTION} Attack that target, then move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no target within 6 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending
commands.command: Use Cunning ability

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
commands.command: Use Self-Destruct ability.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If an attack die is rolled that has no effect (no damage, no surge can be used to any effect)
commands.command: Use Targeting Computer to reroll the die.

commands.condition: Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
commands.command: Use Self-Destruct ability.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 2 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move adjacent to the nearest friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to the nearest friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defending
commands.command: Use Sentinel ability.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defeated
commands.command: Use Vengeance ability.

commands.condition: If possible to be adjacent to 2 hostile figures
commands.command: {ACTION} If necessary, move adjacent to those figures, then {ACTION} Use Brutality ability to attack those targets.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - When a friendly figure within 3 spaces is defeated
commands.command: Use Executor ability.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 2 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move adjacent to the nearest friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to the nearest friendly non-Guardian figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defending
commands.command: Use Sentinel ability.

commands.condition: Reaction - While adjacent to a friendly non-Guardian figure that is defeated
commands.command: Use Vengeance ability and move towards {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If multiple {SURGE} are rolled and accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 6 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If multiple {SURGE} are rolled and accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.

commands.condition: Reaction - When defeated
commands.command: Use Last Stand ability on the closest figure in this figure's group.

commands.condition: If within 5 spaces and LOS of any Rebel figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attempt to move away and out of LOS of any Rebel figures. If still in LOS, {ACTION} attempt to move away and out of LOS of any Rebel figures.

commands.condition: If within 5 spaces and LOS of any Rebel figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the closest unwounded hero, then move away and out of LOS of any Rebel figures.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking a target within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking an adjacent target
commands.command: Use Scattergun ability ability

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 3 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking a target within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking an adjacent target
commands.command: Use Scattergun ability ability

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of any target
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 3 spaces and LOS of {ATTACK_TARGET}, then {ACTION} Attack {ATTACK_TARGET}, then move to {MOVE_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If not within 7 spaces of {ATTACK_TARGET}
commands.command: {ACTION} Move adjacent to {ATTACK_TARGET}.

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking a target within 3 spaces
commands.command: Use Relentless ability

commands.condition: Reaction - If attacking an adjacent target
commands.command: Use ACP Scattergun ability ability
